trans-unit.source: Display the License and Components View

seg-source.mrk: Display the License and Components View

target.mrk: Afficher la vue Licence et composants

trans-unit.source: To verify and manage the licenses that are currently active, you can use the License & Components interface to find procedural information about:

seg-source.mrk: To verify and manage the licenses that are currently active, you can use the License & Components interface to find procedural information about:

target.mrk: Pour vérifier et gérer les licences actuellement actives, vous pouvez utiliser l'interface Licences et composants pour trouver des informations sur :

trans-unit.source: Switching from an evaluation to a standard license.

seg-source.mrk: Switching from an evaluation to a standard license.

target.mrk: Passer d'une licence d'évaluation à une licence standard.

trans-unit.source: Enabling or disabling the use of Atempo products.

seg-source.mrk: Enabling or disabling the use of Atempo products.

target.mrk: Activer ou désactiver l'utilisation de produits Atempo.

trans-unit.source: Changing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Changer l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: To display the License & Components view:

seg-source.mrk: To display the License & Components view:

target.mrk: Pour afficher la vue Licence & Composants :

trans-unit.source: Open the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Open the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Ouvrez la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Select Settings > Preferences > License.

seg-source.mrk: Select Settings > Preferences > License.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Paramètres > Préférences > Licence.

trans-unit.source: The interface parameters enable you to configure and modify the license and components (<MadCap:xref href="#License_Components_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) .

seg-source.mrk: The interface parameters enable you to configure and modify the license and components (<MadCap:xref href="#License_Components_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) .

target.mrk: Les paramètres d'interface vous permettent de configurer et de modifier la licence et les composants (<MadCap:xref href="#License_Components_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) .

trans-unit.source: Name

target.mrk: Nom

trans-unit.source: Product name, either <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HSS), <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hvvmw_hvds" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HVDS), or <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (ALN).

seg-source.mrk: Product name, either <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HSS), <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hvvmw_hvds" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HVDS), or <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (ALN).

target.mrk: Nom du produit, soit <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HSS), <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hvvmw_hvds" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HVDS) ou <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (ALN).

target.mrk: État de la licence (par exemple, le nombre d'agents disponibles ou de jetons acquis).

target.mrk: Expiration

target.mrk: Nombre de jours restants avant l'expiration de la licence.

seg-source.mrk: Number of agents that require a license.

trans-unit.source: License type

seg-source.mrk: License type

target.mrk: Type de licence

trans-unit.source: Possible values are evaluation, standard or MSP license:

seg-source.mrk: Possible values are evaluation, standard or MSP license:

target.mrk: Les valeurs possibles sont licence d'évaluation, standard ou MSP :

trans-unit.source: An evaluation license lasts only for 30 days and is installed by default when you install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

seg-source.mrk: An evaluation license lasts only for 30 days and is installed by default when you install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

target.mrk: Une licence d'évaluation ne dure que 30 jours et est installée par défaut lorsque vous installez le serveur.<MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: A standard license requires an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installed on your network. The standard license is associated with a predefined number of agents, as specified when you purchased the license. This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: A standard license requires an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installed on your network.
The standard license is associated with a predefined number of agents, as specified when you purchased the license.
This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Une licence standard nécessite une installation de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur votre réseau.
La licence standard est associée à un nombre prédéfini d'agents, comme spécifié lors de l'achat de la licence.

Ce type de licence nécessite un serveur de licences et un fichier de licence correspondant à <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: An MSP license can be used for an unlimited number of agents. This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: An MSP license can be used for an unlimited number of agents.
This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Une licence MSP peut être utilisée pour un nombre illimité d'agents.

Ce type de licence nécessite un serveur de licences et un fichier de licence correspondant à <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: License Server

seg-source.mrk: License Server

target.mrk: Serveur de licences

trans-unit.source: For standard licenses only, this parameter displays the License Server name used. To apply a license configuration, provide a server name and a port, then click Apply license configuration.

seg-source.mrk: For standard licenses only, this parameter displays the License Server name used.
To apply a license configuration, provide a server name and a port, then click Apply license configuration.

target.mrk: Pour les licences standard uniquement, ce paramètre affiche le nom du serveur de licences utilisé.
Pour appliquer une configuration de licence, saisissez un nom de serveur et un port, puis cliquez sur Appliquer la configuration de licence.

trans-unit.source: Port

seg-source.mrk: Port

target.mrk: Port

trans-unit.source: License server port number.

seg-source.mrk: License server port number.

target.mrk: Numéro de port du serveur de licences
